sentences.cn: 各种蔬菜都是有益于健康的食物.

sentences.en: Bean curd is now regard as a healthful diet.
sentences.cn: 豆腐现在被认为是有益于健康的食物.

sentences.en: Chinese cooking is both low in calories and healthful.
sentences.cn: 中餐不仅热量低，而且对健康有益。

sentences.en: Do some healthful exercise. It is good for your heart.
sentences.cn: 做一些有益的锻炼,这对你心脏有好处.

sentences.en: Does the college cafeteria provide a healthful diet?
sentences.cn: 大学餐厅供应的膳食是否有益健康呢？

sentences.en: Eat for a Good and Healthful Life Food keeps us alive.
sentences.cn: 为好而健康的生活而吃饭食品维持着我们的生存.

sentences.en: Experiments reveal that walking is much more healthful than running.
sentences.cn: 实验揭示散步比跑步更有益于健康.

sentences.en: Fire is as hurtful as healthful.
sentences.cn: 火有两面性,有利也有弊.
有利于健康的山区空气

sentences.en: Physicians believe that soybeans are healthful food.
sentences.cn: (许多医生相信黄豆是健康食品. )
充足的睡眠有益于健康.

sentences.en: The girl believes vegetables are more healthful, so she rarely eats meat.
sentences.cn: 那个女孩子相信蔬菜对健康更有益, 所以她很少吃肉.

sentences.en: The healthful man can give counsel to the sick.
sentences.cn: 健康的人可以对生病的人提出忠告.

sentences.en: The patients are provided with a very healthful diet in the hospital.
sentences.cn: 医院为病人提供有助于健康的食物.

sentences.en: Too rich a diet is not healthful for you.
sentences.cn: 吃太多油腻的食物不利于身体健康.

words.tran_cn: 健康的，健全的；有益于健康的
医疗保健；健康护理，健康服务；卫生保健
健康的；有益健康的；卫生的
